title: Project Meeting Notes
content:
# Q1 2026 Planning Meeting

## Date & Time
January 27, 2026 - 2:00 PM PST

## Attendees
- **Alice Chen** (Product Manager)
- **Bob Wilson** (Engineering Lead)
- **Carol Martinez** (Design Lead)
- **David Kim** (QA Manager)

## Agenda

### 1. Q4 2025 Review
- Successfully launched v2.0
- User growth: +45% QoQ
- Performance improvements: 30% faster load times
- Customer satisfaction: 4.7/5.0 stars

### 2. Q1 2026 Goals

#### Engineering
- **Mobile app launch** (iOS & Android)
- **API v3 migration**
- **Performance optimization** - Target: 50% reduction in response time
- **Security audit** - Complete OWASP Top 10 review

#### Product
- **User onboarding redesign**
- **Advanced analytics dashboard**
- **Integration with 3rd party tools**
- **Premium tier launch**

#### Design
- **Design system v2**
- **Accessibility improvements** - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- **Dark mode support**
- **Responsive design updates**

### 3. Resource Allocation

| Team | Headcount | Budget |
|------|-----------|--------|
| Engineering | 8 | $1.2M |
| Product | 3 | $450K |
| Design | 4 | $600K |
| QA | 3 | $400K |

### 4. Timeline

- **Week 1-2**: Sprint planning & setup
- **Week 3-8**: Development sprint 1
- **Week 9-10**: QA & testing
- **Week 11-12**: Beta release
- **Week 13**: Final release

## Action Items

- [ ] **Alice**: Draft product roadmap document by Feb 3
- [ ] **Bob**: Complete technical architecture review by Feb 5
- [ ] **Carol**: Share design mockups for mobile app by Feb 7
- [ ] **David**: Set up automated testing pipeline by Feb 10
- [ ] **All**: Review and approve Q1 budget by Feb 14

## Next Meeting

**Date**: February 10, 2026  
**Time**: 2:00 PM PST  
**Location**: Conference Room B / Zoom  
**Agenda**: Mid-sprint review and blocker discussion

## Notes

- Engineering team needs additional backend developer for API v3
- Design team requests 2 additional weeks for accessibility audit
- Marketing wants early access to beta for PR campaign
- Legal review required before premium tier pricing announcement

---

*Document created: January 27, 2026*  
*Last updated: January 27, 2026*
